creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Voodoo dancer in center with body parts, skull and bottle; "Guedemaziaka" in sequins and beads above figure in border; "Edgar" in beads and sequins below figure; single row of pearls frame center image; border blue semicircles (2 rows); entire surface covered with beads and sequins; outer border of purple satin
marks: in maroon sequins and clear beads above pearls: [G
medium: Sequins, beads, synthetic fibers or silk, pearls, cotton
title: Flag
